definition[0]_en: A production method for tactile resources using either a metal or plastic sheet as a master or embossing equipment (often in combination with a computer and specialized software) to produce braille and Moon copies.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A production method for tactile resources using either a metal or plastic sheet as a master or embossing equipment (often in combination with a computer and specialized software) to produce braille and Moon copies.

definition[0]_en: A production method for tactile resources in which solid plastic dots are heat sealed onto the surface of thin but strong paper.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A production method for tactile resources in which solid plastic dots are heat sealed onto the surface of thin but strong paper.

definition[0]_en: A production method for tactile resources in which an image is printed on a special type of paper with embedded microcapsules of alcohol which burst when exposed to heat to make the surface of the paper swell up.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A production method for tactile resources in which an image is printed on a special type of paper with embedded microcapsules of alcohol which burst when exposed to heat to make the surface of the paper swell up.

definition[0]_en: A production method for tactile resources in which a collage master is covered with a sheet of plastic, which is heated and vacuumed to generate a copy of a model or diagram.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A production method for tactile resources in which a collage master is covered with a sheet of plastic, which is heated and vacuumed to generate a copy of a model or diagram.
